name: Tumblr Bitches & Shit Buttons Pack
description:
Got a potty mouth? 
Replace your posts, followers, likes, following, and find blogs buttons with bitches and shit.

Posts→Shit I Posted
Followers→Bitches Love Me
Likes→Shit I Like
Following→Bitches I Love
Find Blogs→Find Bitches
additional_info: I follow back if you follow me. <3

discussions.name: All my favorite sidebars in one.
cant see this style on my facebook,  just ordinary fb gui
